fields.name: DataCollectionFrequency
fields.description: Usage data collection frequency in ISO 8601 duration format e.g. PT10M , PT5H.

fields.name: DataReportingFrequency
fields.description: Usage data reporting frequency in ISO 8601 duration format e.g. PT10M , PT5H.

fields.name: EventHubDetails
fields.description: Details of Event Hub where the usage will be reported.

fields.name: MaxAllowedUnreportedUsageDuration
fields.description: Maximum time for which the functionality of the device will not be hampered for not reporting the usage data.
